headline: DOGE Comes for Clean Energy, Putting Exxon and Occidental Projects at Risk
summary: Thousands of Energy Department jobs are expected to be eliminated as Trump goes after a favorite target.

headline: 2 No-Brainer Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy Right Now
summary: Warren Buffett's holding company, Berkshire Hathaway, has done very well over the decades, posting average annual returns in excess of 20%.  Much of this performance was generated from Berkshire's publicly traded portfolio.  Right now, more than 10% of this portfolio is invested in just two stocks.
